Prompt: Result value is not numeric or NA and no detection limit value is provided (see TADA.ResultMeasureValueDataTypes.Flag)
flagType: Result value is not numeric or NA and no detection limit value is provided

Prompt: Result value is not numeric or NA and the detection limit value cannot be interpreted because there is a conflict between the detection condition text and detection limit type provided by the data submitter [or the detection limit type is not in WQX domain tables (USGS/NWIS-specific)] (see TADA.CensoredData.Flag)
flagType: Result value is not numeric or NA and the detection limit value cannot be interpreted because there is a conflict between the detection condition text and detection limit type provided by the data submitter [or the detection limit type is not in WQX domain tables (USGS/NWIS-specific)]

Prompt: Suspect characteristic and speciation combination (see TADA.MethodSpeciation.Flag)
Suspect characteristic and fraction combination (see TADA.SampleFraction.Flag)
Suspect characteristic and unit combination (see TADA.ResultUnit.Flag)
ActivityTypeCode indicates result value is a QC replicate, duplicate, or blank (see TADA.ActivityType.Flag)
flagType: ActivityTypeCode indicates result value is a QC replicate, duplicate, or blank

Prompt: MeasureQualifierCode indicates result value is suspect (see TADA.MeasureQualifierCode.Flag)
flagType: MeasureQualifierCode indicates result value is suspect

Prompt: Metadata indicates duplicative uploads of the same results within a single organization (see TADA.SingleOrgDup.Flag)
flagType: Metadata indicates duplicative uploads of the same results within a single organization

Prompt: Metadata indicates duplicative uploads of the same results by multiple organizations (see TADA.ResultSelectedMultipleOrgs)
flagType: Metadata indicates duplicative uploads of the same results by multiple organizations

Prompt: Uncommon or suspect characteristic and analytical method combination (see TADA.AnalyticalMethod.Flag)
flagType: Uncommon or suspect characteristic and analytical method combination

Prompt: Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPPApprovedIndicator) indicates "N" (not approved) or NA
flagType: Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPPApprovedIndicator) indicates "N" (not approved) or NA

Prompt: Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPP) document is not available via the ProjectFileUrl (see TADA.QAPPDocAvailable)
flagType: Quality Assurance Project Plan (QAPP) document is not available via the ProjectFileUrl

Prompt: Metadata indicates result(s) are aggregate, high-frequency continuous sensor results, not discrete samples (see TADA.AggregatedContinuousData.Flag)
flagType: Metadata indicates result(s) are aggregate, high-frequency continuous sensor results, not discrete samples

Prompt: Result value(s) above the national threshold for a given characteristic, possibly indicating non-sensical value(s) (see TADA.ResultValueAboveUpperThreshold.Flag)
flagType: Result value(s) above the national upper threshold for a given characteristic, possibly indicating non-sensical value(s)

Prompt: Result value(s) below the national threshold for a given characteristic, possibly indicating non-sensical value(s) (see TADA.ResultValueBelowLowerThreshold.Flag)
flagType: Result value(s) below the national lower threshold for a given characteristic, possibly indicating non-sensical value(s)

Prompt: Coordinates are outside of the United States (see TADA.InvalidCoordinates.Flag)
flagType: Coordinates are outside of the United States

Prompt: Coordinates are imprecise (less than three decimal digits) (see TADA.InvalidCoordinates.Flag)
flagType: Coordinates are imprecise (less than three decimal digits)
